dialog: Oh the usual. Grading papers and trying to calm down angry parents.
Oh I'm sorry, Mom. Your day sounds so busy all the time.
It's true, but I wouldn't give up teaching for the world. Speaking of busy, Haley honey, how was lab?
It could've been better, but I'm sure things will turn around tomorrow.
I'm sure it will be, sweetieâ€¦ Oh Haley, how have you and your partner been lately?

dialog: Oh Carmen? It's been going great! We'll be celebrating our 3 year anniversary, so I'm heading to her apartment tomorrow.
Wow! Time flies by so fast. It feels like only yesterday that you brought Carmen over to family dinner and introduced her.
Yeah, I'm so happy to be with her.
I'm happy that you're happy, Haley :)
Yeah! I have the keys to her place, so I hope to surprise her with a fancy candlelight dinner. She's so sweet and adorable.
Yeah, I may be old but I'm not heartless, I saw you two being snuggly during movies ;)
Ack Mom! ...Yeah we like holding hands and generally being physically affectionate. >.<
Oh really? So tell me, how would two girls even have sex? 0_o
